name: Needle in a Neighborhood
description:
Needle in a Neighborhood
Created for Ludum Dare 37 by AAGH GamesPlease rate the game on Ludum Dare!

Search a small residential neighborhood for the One Room containing a giant golden needle. There are ten houses with 80 total rooms to explore. Only one contains the needle, and since the rooms are randomized each time you play, you get endless replayability.


CONTROLS
  • WASD moves and the mouse looks
  • Spacebar opens interior doors (exterior doors don't need opened, just walk up to them)
  • The escape key opens up the pause menu

Art and Programming; Richard Heil

Music and Concept: William Klein
